sentences.en: A canny investor would need to predict when the dollar will once more start tumbling.
sentences.cn: 精明的投资者需要预计到美元何时会再次大跌。

sentences.en: As Liz had predicted , the rumours were soon forgotten.
sentences.cn: 正如利兹所预料的，流言很快就被淡忘了。

sentences.en: Birth rates are notoriously difficult to predict.
sentences.cn: 众所周知,出生率是很难预测的.

sentences.en: Election officials predict they'll set a new turnout record for an off-year election in Washington state.
sentences.cn: 选举官员预测他们将在华盛顿州创下非大选年投票人数的新纪录。

sentences.en: I cannot predict when to meet her again.
sentences.cn: 我无法预测什么时候会再见到她.

sentences.en: I predict it will run and run.
sentences.cn: 我估计这会一直延续下去。

sentences.en: It is yet premature to predict the possible outcome of the dialogue.
sentences.cn: 预言这次对话可能有什么结果为时尚早.

sentences.en: It will be many years before anyone can predict a hurricane's behavior with much accuracy.
sentences.cn: 要能够相当准确地预测出飓风的特性尚需多年。

sentences.en: It's hard to predict how things will turn out.
Many predict 1991 will rival the great vintage of 1965.
sentences.cn: 许多人预测1991年酿制的葡萄酒可以与1965年生产的佳酿相媲美。

sentences.en: Sales were five percent lower than predicted.
Statisticians predict a fall in unemployment by 2004.
sentences.cn: 统计学家们预测2004年失业率会下降.

sentences.en: The most recent polls predict a tight three-way race.
sentences.cn: 最近的调查显示，这将是一场三方激烈角逐的比赛。

sentences.en: This cynicism makes today's young people hard to predict.
sentences.cn: 这种愤世嫉俗的人生观使当今的年轻人难以揣摩.

sentences.en: We can't predict the outcome. There are too many imponderables.
sentences.cn: 我们无法预测结果，难以预料的情况太多了。

sentences.en: Weather forecasts predict more hot weather, gusty winds and lightning strikes.
sentences.cn: 天气预报预测高温、大风和雷电天气将继续。

sentences.en: Whether this will be successful or not is still difficult to predict.

trans.tran_en: to say that something will happen, before it happens
to say that something will happen, before it happens
